description: Test suite for the Agent class with custom retriever functions in the agno project, including tests for normal operation, error handling, and search knowledge features.

methods.name: test_agent_with_custom_retriever
methods.description: Tests the agent's ability to use a custom retriever function that returns a fixed response.

methods.name: test_agent_with_custom_retriever_error
methods.description: Tests the agent's behavior when the custom retriever raises an exception.

methods.name: test_agent_with_custom_retriever_search_knowledge_error
methods.description: Tests the agent's behavior when the retriever raises an exception during a search knowledge operation.
